title: India can be global AI use case capital: MeitY Secretary
description: India should aim to become the global use case capital for artificial intelligence (AI) if the adoption of the technology is to be spread widely, electronics and information technology secretary S Krishnan said on Monday.
content:

title: A new gig rises, will it scale up?
description: As AI models grow more complex, a new white-collar gig workforce has emerged to review and guide systems. A new category of AI-related work is unravelling in India, where professionals are paid not just to label data, but to review, validate, and guide artificial intelligence systems. Who are these humans-in-the-loop? Puran Choudhary explores
content:

title: India much higher than US from growth perspective, says top Bosch executive
description: For German manufacturing giant Bosch, India is emerging as a key development base for its artificial intelligence-related technology innovations in smart mobility and industrial manufacturing. The company, which earlier this year committed to investing $2.9 billion in AI-related innovations, is looking at India as a key software hub for all its global business developments. The country houses more than 20,000 of Bosch’s 38,000 software developers.

title: India most essential to US: New US envoy on trade deal
